Àtụ:Infobox journal
The Malawi Medical Journal bụ akwukwo ahụike n'ozuzu ya nke a na-ebipụta kwa nkeji iri na ise ma bụrụ nke a na'emeghe ma na-enyocha  Ndi igbo Ọ bụ mahadumMalawi College of Medicine na Medical Association of Malawi bipụtara ya

E guzobere ya na 1979 dị ka Medical Quarterly, na-enweta aha ya ugbu a mgbe a maliteghachiri ya na 1991.  Dị ka Journal Citation Reports si kwuo, akwụkwọ akụkọ ahụ nwere mmetụta nke 1.123, na-etinye ya na 147th n'ime akwukwo akụkọ 172 na ngalaba "Public, Environmental & Occupational Health", kwa dị ka nke 2017.
